oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pilot Study of Pediatric Integrative Medicine in Pediatric Oncology, General Pediatrics and Pediatric Cardiology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vohra, Sunita
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study will investigate if adding complementary therapies such as acupuncture, massage and reiki to inpatient pediatric care is feasible and what the effects are on outcomes such as patient symptoms, cost, safety, satisfaction and length of stay.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
complementary medicine
pediatrics
alternative medicine
